articles.author: ALLISON GATLIN, Investor's Business Daily
articles.title: Biotech Stock Launches 240% On Possible Huntington's Cure - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: The company's gene therapy slowed disease progression by 75% over three years.
articles.content:
UniQure (QURE) stock catapulted more than 200% Wednesday after the company said its experimental gene therapy successfully treated Huntington's disease.
